long: All zero sha1 - typically seen in PCRs 0..16 and 23 of a just started/cleared TPM
All F sha1 - typically seen in PCRs 17 to 22 of a just started/cleared TPM

All zero sha512 - typically seen in PCRs 0..16 and 23 of a just started/cleared TPM
All F sha512 - typically seen in PCRs 17 to 22 of a just started/cleared TPM
The hash value seen in PCRs which have been extended by the EV_SEPARATOR value once. Typically seen in PCRs 2 and 3 of machines without additional ROM
The hash value seen in PCRs which have been extended by the EV_SEPARATOR value once. Typically seen in PCRs 2 and 3 of machines without additional ROM

A Lenovo Carbon X1 5th Generation UEFI CRTM
This is the TPM 2.0 firmware value generated by the IBM TPM Simulator. This value will be seen as part of the TPMS_ATTEST structure generated by a quote

This is the TPM 2.0 firmware value for an Infineon TPM 2.0 SLB 9760 Pre 2020 release. This version has a potential flaw in the RSA key generation. This value will be seen as part of the TPMS_ATTEST structure generated by a quote
